programme.title: Republican convention Kansas
programme.short_synopsis: Buckley joins Republican presidential hopefuls at Kansas convention.
programme.medium_synopsis: Conservative Senator Buckley joins hopefuls for Kansas Republican convention vote.
programme.long_synopsis:
Conservative Senator Buckley joins hopefuls for Kansas Republican convention vote.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
